content: Who does not like a Job that make you an Ambassador ? Who does not like the yearly Salary of $160,000 dollars ? You will not like it if you are making more than $160 K in a year. But, I am speaking on the top of your income if you are working for yourself and making money out of Botcoin business then why not becoming a recognised and appointed Bitcoin Ambassador and get paid for representing Bitcoin to the Governments around the world officially ? Think about it. I was Monk for years, then I have chosen to become a Digotal Monk .  Now I am considering myself to become a Bitcoin Ambassador Officially. Ofcourse, you might ask me who has appointed me in this position and who is going to pay me $160,000 dollars a year ? Well, it a Bitcoin confidential for a short time. In other word, I have appointed myself as a Official Bitcoin Ambassador. You can trust me or nor but I am considering this post for myself for the times being as I have decided to become the Bitcoin Ambssador. Soon, I am going to make the Official Announcement. I will also appoint another 300 Bitcoin Ambassadors who are interested to work in the Bitcoin Embassy in a Official capacity. If any one want to become a Bitcoin Ambassador and work with me as a fellow Bitcoin Ambassador then you are invited to contact me. Do not worry about who is going pay the salary to the 300 Bitcoin Ambassadors ? That is my duty to find money to pay you for your work as an official Bitcoin Ambassador. There will be a budget for each Ambassador who will be commissioned to go to a foreign country and work closely with government and central Bank. Ps: if any one hackle me in this proposal, no mater who you are ?  I will not tolerate. You are here to support each others only. If you need further information ask me question. Thank you. First Official Bitcoin Ambassador aka Digital Monk
